alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwest Lake County through 745 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Griffin, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Leesburg, Eustis, Tavares, Lady Lake and Lake Griffin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Southern Lake County
